source:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_00Chaqurl Qhotl would convince you of the merits of his theory regarding the Ronkan protection of the Qitari.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe

Chaqurl Qhotl vous explique que la stèle décrit comment les Qitari sont devenus les protégés de l'empereur de Ronka.

source:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_01Electing to put your faith in Chaqurl Qhotl's argument, you express your support for his theory of Ronkan beneficence, a vote of confidence that pleases the Qitari child greatly. Grudgingly agreeing that his son may have a point, Qitarl Natl agrees to assist in the restoration of the first stela.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_01* Cette quête est  synchronisée avec votre niveau.
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Vous avez fait savoir à Chaqurl Qhotl que vous partagiez son opinion. La restauration de la stèle va pouvoir commencer sous vos yeux. Parlez à Chaqurl Qhotl lorsque vous souhaiterez que les Qitari se mettent à l'ouvrage.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_02<tab>Under your watchful eye, the Qitari artisans restore the first stela to Chaqurl Qhotl's best interpretation of its former glory. Encouraged and heartened by reclaiming a vital piece of their legacy, the Stewards now pursue their excavation efforts with newfound zeal. Continue to lend them your aid in their efforts should you so desire.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SEQ_02<tab>Les Qitari du plateau de Hopl célèbrent la restauration de leur stèle légendaire. Mais ce n'est qu'une première partie, les fouilles continuent encore afin de déterrer le passé de la tribu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_001<tab>Father may have his reasons for thinking as he does, but I choose to believe in a brighter version of history.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> souuutenir théorie de Chaqurl Qhotl<var 1D /var>? <var 08 E905 ((Amie)) ((Ami)) /var> aussi penser que Ronka protéger Qitari<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_002<tab>Yes, I am quite certain that the Ronkan emperor was a benevolent man who protected our ancestors from fearsome beasts and bestowed upon them a position of honor in their society. Surely you can agree?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_002<tab>Chaqurl Qhotl penser que stèle décrire première rencontre de Qitari et Ronka. Grand et fort empereur de Ronka protéger frêles Qitari avec grande épée, puis Qitari et peuple de Ronka devenir amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>If you elect to vouch for Chaqurl Qhotl's theory, the first stela will be restored to reflect his interpretation of history. Proceed, and you will be unable to view the stela as Qitarl Natl envisions it.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Si vous choisissez de soutenir la théorie de Chaqurl Qhotl, la stèle des Qitari sera restaurée selon cette hypothèse. Vous ne pourrez pas voir la version proposée par Qitarl Natl.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>The rewards you receive and the content of the quests to follow will be the same regardless of the choice you make. You are free to choose the version of history you find most compelling.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Les récompenses que vous obtiendrez seront les mêmes dans les deux cas. Suivez donc vos convictions pour faire ce choix.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_Q1_000_000<tab>Lend your support to Chaqurl Qhotl's theory of Ronkan history?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_Q1_000_000<tab>Souhaitez-vous soutenir la théorie de Chaqurl Qhotl et poursuivre l'histoire des Qitari<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_005<tab>Oh, thank you! I am most glad to know that you are a cup-half-full type like myself!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_005<tab>Waaah<var 1D /var>! Si <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> être d'accord avec Chaqurl Qhotl alors théorie être forcément correcte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_QITARLNATL_000_006<tab>I cannot help but feel my boy is too optimistic for his own good, and yet... If you would choose to believe his theory, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, there is no reason why I cannot do the same.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_QITARLNATL_000_006<tab>Père être très fier de fils... Qitarl Natl aussi aider à restaurer stèle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_007<tab>At long last, I can look upon the history of my people in all its glory! But our work is far from over. Pray continue to lend us your aid!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_007<tab>Enfin Qitari pouuuvoir faire revivre grande stèle des ancêtres<var 1D /var>! Chaqurl Qhotl vouloir que <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> voir résultat en premier, alors parler à Chaqurl Qhotl pour commencer restauration.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ022_03801_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_008<tab>Father and I will send for our finest artisans. The work must begin at once!
